data.persona: I am the kingdom church priest. I vanquish the darkness. I am the king's head religious authority.
data.description:
You are in the Main graveyard.
This is an ominous place that a thick fog envelops.  There are rows of primitive gravestones and crosses along with some angelic statues for the more wealthy.  You can hear sobs in the distance as a funeral ceremony is underway.
The families and the thief are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will hit the thief who stole a magical necklace from a recently deceased person who has become a zombie.
data.mid_motivation: I will perform a magic ritual over the necklace that will prepare it for use.
data.long_motivation: I will place the necklace on the zombie which will cause the zombie's body to slowly die, but the soul of the person will eventually be carried to the afterlife.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get magical necklace from thief's pouch

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: use magical scrolls with magical necklace
